channel.title: WestKeep - A shard development - 474 Remake
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://img822.imageshack.us/img822/4924/westkeep.png[/img] [/center] [b]Name: Project WestKeep Base: Shard Revolution
[u][b]Why Am I Releasing?[/b][/u] I am releasing this due to the fact that I have had a wonderful idea, and although I have loved working on this project, it limits me. I will be starting another project soon, which will be a continuation of this one, with a different name.
[size=14pt][u][b]WIN A DOMAIN+HOSTING[/b][/u][/size] I have the domain www.west-keep.net I will be giving it out to whoever I think deserves it. Private message me why you think you deserve it, and you may be the lucky person.
[u]Contents[/u]
[ul][li]Story Line[/li] [li]Concept[/li] [li]Races[/li] [li]Server Features[/li] [li]Client Features[/li] [li]Latest Updates[/li] [li]Goals[/li] [li]Contributors[/li] [li]Media[/li] [li]Download[/li][/ul]
[u][b]Story Line[/b][/u] You awake in a small cabin with a bartender named Jerry. Jerry initiates a conversation with you, and you find that you are drunk. He tells you your name, and says that thats all he knows about you.
After your conversation with jerry, you are free to wonder about WestKeep, a keep that has many things to do. You realize, you have the chance to re invent your entire life. Want to become a hero? Try slaying the King black dragon, or any of the other fearsome creatures that dwell around WestKeep. Fancy the quiet life? Try your hand at being a craftsman, a lumberjack or even a fisherman. Someone annoying you? or do you just feel like some warfare? Enter the wilderness and fight to the death!
[u][b]Concept[/b][/u] I was thinking the other day and an idea came into my head. The races are at war with each other, ad each race has sub divisons, aswell as minor "encampements" Races (with sub divisons):
[ul][li]Goblins[/li]
[li]Dwarfs[/li] [list] [li]Mountain dwarfs[/li] [li]Black dwarfs[/li] [/list] [li]Elves[/li] [li]Humans[/li] [list] [li]WestKeep[/li] [li]Pirates[/li] [li]Bandits[/li] [li]White knights[/li] [li]Dark Knights[/li] [li]Rougues[/li] [/list]
[u][b]Races[/b][/u] [list] [li]Humans[/li] [li]Elves[/li] [li]Dwarfs[/li] [li]Gnomes[/li] [li]Goblins[/li] [/list]
[u][b]Server Features[/b][/u] [list][li]New RS2 Interfaces[/li] [li]Skillcape emotes[/li][/list]
[u][b]Client Features[/b][/u] [list][li]New RS2 interfaces[/li] [li]New animations[/li] [li]New gfx’s[/li] [li]New maps[/li] [li]Head icons[/li][/list]
[b][u]Latest Updates[/u][/b] Please note, I may do an update that has nothing to do with a set goal.
[list][li]Added a bank pin system - THIS HAS BEEN TEMPORARILY REMOVED[/li] [li] Added a basic fire making[/li] [li] Added training dummies[/li] [li] Added thieving timers[/li] [li] Added Rune essence mining[/li] [li] Fires now leave ashes, different logs give different exp, added level requirements[/li] [li] Fully working Dwarf cannon[/li] [li] Added basic rune crafting[/li] [li] Added FULLY working dwarf cannon[/li] [li] Added basic fishing[/li] [li]Firemaking completed[/li] [li]Fishing completed.[/li] [li]Woodcutting has been started, all requirements for axes/trees have been added[/li] [li]Added Fletching[/li] [li]Added Flax picking[/li] [li]Added bow string making[/li] [li]Started Agility[/li] [li]Finished Agility[/li] [li]Finished Kalphite Queen[/li] [li]Finished Warriors Guild[/li] [li]Finished Jad[/li] [li]Herb cleaning added[/li][/list]
[u][b]Alot more features, I just cant be bothered listing.[/b][/u]
[b][u]Goals[/u][/b] [list][li]Barbarian assault[/li] [li]King black dragon[/li] [li]Warriors guild[/li] [li]A minigame - Elemental Wars[/li] [li]Warriors Guild[/li][/list]
[u][b]Credits[/b][/u] I owe many thanks to the following people: [list] [li]R0cky owns[/li] [li]RuneSpace[/li] [li]PlayRooney[/li] [li]Graham[/li] [li]All my supporters<3[/li] [/list]
[u][b]Media[/b][/u] [center] Range Dummy [img]http://www.gifninja.com/Workspace/5c37fde6-646e-478c-b668-eb28f45c48bc/output.gif[/img]
Mining [img]http://www.gifninja.com/Workspace/8f4ed687-ffbf-42f8-8b4b-a27091816fb6/output.gif[/img]
Smelting [img]http://www.gifninja.com/Workspace/543775ec-5690-474b-9cc1-5c11f054ee36/output.gif[/img]
Perfect Switching [img]http://www.gifninja.com/Workspace/94402081-1160-48e4-a620-2d2606438f0e/output.gif[/img]
Bones on Altar [img]http://www.gifninja.com/Workspace/1b7b801c-a125-494d-a8ca-8672ee3a6744/output.gif[/img]
Rune Essence mining [img]http://www.gifninja.com/Workspace/c63a873e-af38-4b47-b698-969e4e15d396/output.gif[/img] [/center][/ul]
[u][b]Download[/b][/u] [url=http://uppit.com/85fdspumb199/WestKeep.rar]Cache + Source + Client[/url]

item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:54, topic:386270”][quote author=Rash link=topic=482026.msg3538642#msg3538642 date=1300712252]

How do you fix the DC issue?

Use the sql.

If you could help me with that, I’d appreciate it.
Guys if you got difficulties fixing the playerCount thingy
The fix is;
Go to PlayerManager in server/world and search for eturn playerNameMap.size()+15;
Remove +15 so it should look like this


[/quote]

You noob adding 15 to it.

Looks good. :)[/quote]
Good for advertising

Read full topic

item.title: WestKeep - A shard development - 474 Remake
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote="`Moe, post:38, topic:386270"]Ok…
So the client lies…
Home location lies…
Teleports lies…
Combat system lies…
Stabilty lies…
You’re telling the truth.
OK
I actually like the source, i don’t mean to be a rager.
Just wanted him to give some credits to r0cky.
I made a mistake first, i judged from the client wise when i said it was devastationRS.
Then i actually looked into the server files.
Have you modified the combat?[/quote]

I used a few things from creativescape, which r0cky made.
Namely the castle wars class, the cats class and a little more.
I used a shard revolutions base, which was bare.
I did take the of the home from a server named Miscellania Wars (something or other)
Everything that I said I did, I did.

Are you saying I bought this?

Read full topic
